snippet: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, the Myanmar opposition leader, said on Friday that boycotting an upcoming election was an “option” if a military-drafted Constitution remained unchanged.
abstract: Myanmar opposition leader Daw Aung San Suu Kyi does not rule out possibility that her National League for Democracy party could boycott upcoming national elections if military-drafted Constitution is not changed.
lead_paragraph: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, the Myanmar opposition leader, said on Friday that boycotting an upcoming election was an “option” if a military-drafted Constitution remained unchanged.

headline.main: Myanmar: Opposition Party Leader Is Considering an Election Boycott
headline.print_headline: Asia; Myanmar: Leader of Opposition Party Is Considering a Boycott of Elections
